title: Howard University President on Reopening
itunes:title: Howard University President on Reopening
description:
Howard University President Dr. Wayne Frederick discusses reopening his school and talks about racial equality. He discusses changes in the structure of classes, testing on campus, and strategies for ensuring student success.

Host: Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
